Package game.levelLoader

Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.levelLoader.GameWorld
public class GameWorld extends city.cs.engine.World
Represents the game world where all game objects and interactions take place. Manages the player, door, and background, and sets up the physics environment.
